names.bio: Michael Elsworth was born on June 12, 1932 in the UK. He is known for his work on The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring (2001), The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King (2003) and Fantômes contre fantômes (1996).
names.name: Michael Elsworth
